com.soa.agent

Interface Message

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessage, SourceMessage, StreamMessage

    public interface Message
    Interface representing a message that is part of MessageContext.

    • Method Summary

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,javax.security.auth.Subject> getSubjects()

        Returns:
        Map of Subjects keyed by String subject categories.

      • getMessageHeader

        MessageHeader getMessageHeader(javax.xml.namespace.QName qname)
        Get a specifig message header
        Parameters:
        qname - the QName of the desired header
        Returns:
        MessageHEader bean or null if header not present

      • setMessageHeader

        void setMessageHeader(MessageHeader header)
        Set a single message header into the message
        Parameters:
        header - the MessageHeader bean defining the new header

      • setMessageHeader

        void setMessageHeader(javax.xml.namespace.QName qname,
                      org.w3c.dom.DocumentFragment content)
        Add a single header to the message from parts
        Parameters:
        qname - the QName of the new header
        content - the XML definition of the new header as a DocumentFragment

      • setMessageHeaders

        void setMessageHeaders(java.util.List<MessageHeader> headers)
        Replace all message headers with a new set.
        Parameters:
        headers - a List of MessageHEader beans that will replace any existing headers
